## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G25790](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G25790)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>HHO1, NIGT1.3</u>
- **Gene Name:** HRS1 homologue 1, NITRATE-INDUCIBLE, GARP-TYPE TRANSCRIPTIONAL REPRESSOR 1/HYPERSENSITIVE TO LOW Pi-ELICITED PRIMARY ROOT SHORTENING 1.3
- **Description:**   myb-like transcription factor family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
